thread.title: After Amazon India, OnePlus 2 could go on sale via Snapdeal tomorrow
thread.title_full: After Amazon India, OnePlus 2 could go on sale via Snapdeal tomorrow

title: After Amazon India, OnePlus 2 could go on sale via Snapdeal tomorrow
text: After Amazon India, OnePlus 2 could go on sale via Snapdeal tomorrow Thursday, 10 September 2015 (15 minutes ago) Since OnePlus made its debut in India last year with the OnePlus One, it has remained an Amazon India exclusive. It launched the OnePlus 2 last month, which too is available exclusively via the same e-commerce site. However, it seems like there is going to be a small change in the arrangement. Just one day to go! Who’s excited to find out #WhatsInTheBox? @Snapdeal https://t.co/ytofgPDBZc — OnePlus India (@OnePlus_IN) September 10, 2015 Snapdeal and OnePlus have been teasing about some kind of a partnership via their respective Twitter accounts. The teasers show a gift-wrapped box with the OnePlus logo, and the hashtag #WhatsInTheBox. Happy to partner with @Snapdeal & looking forward to fun times ahead. Tomorrow, all will be revealed! #WhatsInTheBox pic.twitter.com/Cjg0nCQZ1m — Vikas Agarwal (@Vikas_AGL)
